title.narrative: COVID19 Civic Space Response West Africa

description.narrative: This project will support 2 initiatives at WAF region covering civil society response to civic space shrinking during the Covid 19crisis : 1. The first initiative is : Covid-19 pandemic in West Africa- Civil society rapid response to protect civic spaceand foster civic engagement will be implemented by WACSI ( West Africa Civil Society Institute ) aims to document COVID-19 inspiredlaws by government to curb the pandemic and its implications on human rights, civic freedom, and civic space; and ensure that CSOs (especially local organisations) are exposed to basic digital infrastructure, resources and capacity to continue to mobilize, organize, advocate and execute their core mandates unhindered within their respective countries. 2. The second initiative is Mappingof youth COVID-19 responses initiatives in WAF, implemented by Africtivistes (a Ligue Africaine des Blogueurs et Cyber-activistespour la Démocratie) it aims to Promote the initiatives of young people in the fight against COVI-19 in order to demonstrate their transformative power and their capacity to mobilize to make a proposal for collaboration with governance structures from the local tothe national / regional level.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam Intermon is a member of Oxfam International, a confederation of 17 independent national organisations working in more than 90countries. Oxfam works on six goals that support the shared vision of a just world without poverty: help people claim their right to a better life; champion equal rights for women; saving lives, now and in the future; safeguard global food supplies; help people claim a fairer share of natural resources; and increase money for basic services. For 70 years, Oxfam has been running emergency responses, development projects and campaigning at the grass roots level to tackle poverty.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
